title: Medical lien from auto accident survive chapter 7 bankruptcy?
question: Just wondering. Debt was discharged in bk and now he got a small settlement.
question_tags: Bankruptcy,Chapter 7 bankruptcy,Bankruptcy petition,Bankruptcy documents,Debt,Lien,Bankruptcy and debt
answers:
Although the debt was discharged, if the underlying claim (insurance proceeds from auto accident) has any value, the creditor can collect from this source of security.

Hope this perspective helps!
Generally a bankruptcy filing does not affect valid and perfected liens.
Medical liens do survive a bankruptcy.
